title: New Duo Champ BIRD THINGS TEASER OMFG!!

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=MlIRiHyI,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-04-03T19:41:51.649+0000)
>
> My first thought
> 
>  http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/rickandmorty/images/b/b1/Birdperson.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/250?cb=20140415133633

**DAMMIT!!!!!!**

I was gonna say that.
I just hope it's not a champ that toggles the one in play (similar to nidalee/jayce interactions)
I'm pretty sure they're actually supposed to be two unique champions designed to work together.
Hopefully this champion will actually be a duo champion.
I hope it's not like Cho'Gall. So gimmicky :(
With a community like League of Legend's. I do hope it's not like Cho'Gall. Such amazing designs. I am hyped.
It'd be cool to see another transforming champ where they can swap positions or something.
We have enough of those, i would prefer a real duo.
I realllllllllllllllly hope whichever one is the support is SUPER fun. I know it wont be the girl, but there is hope in my heart.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I haven't been this excited for some new champs in SO Long.
They look SUPER cute and the new lore has only gotten me more excited.
I hope we see some heartseeker skins for them next year where they're both dancing together.
I love them and I will treat them well.
I already ship these two so much and I don't even know their names???
they are actually a couple, in the youtube description it says "she fights for the cause, he fights for her"

I mean he could be a stalker, lets not shut down any stupid ideas here.  
######(Mandatory kappa)
Skywrath Mage got fed up with being in the same game as Nyx Assassin.
